original_text: And Jesus went throughout all the cities and villages, teaching in their synagogues and proclaiming the gospel of the kingdom and healing every disease and every affliction.
korean_text: 예수께서 모든 도시와 마을에 두루 다니사 그들의 회당에서 가르치시며 천국 복음을 전파하시며 모든 병과 모든 약한 것을 고치시니라

sentences.original_text: And Jesus went throughout all the cities and villages
and proclaiming the gospel of the kingdom
and healing every disease and every affliction
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 병과 모든 약한 것을 고치셨습니다
